metadata.title: CVE-2020-21468 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** A segmentation fault in the redis-server component of Redis 5.0.7 leads to a denial of service (DOS). NOTE: the vendor cannot reproduce this issue in a released version, such as 5.0.7.

criterions.comment: redis package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
